price: Tubibihutishiriza ku bw’ineza (bakwiye)? (Si ko bimeze) ahubwo (ni ukubareshya) nyamara ntibabimenya.
arabic: نُسَارِعُ لَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِۚ بَل لَّا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: nusāriʿu lahum fī al-khayrāti bal lā yashʿurūna
